sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.message_type_cd ,main.message_title ,main.message_content ,main.importance_degree_cd ,main.send_type_cd ,main.send_dept_uids ,main.send_role_uids ,main.message_start_date ,main.message_end_date ,main.all_count ,main.unread_count ,main.is_mail_notice ,main.is_sms_notice ,main.is_rich_message ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,CMN001.sub_name message_type_name ,CMN002.sub_name importance_degree_name ,CMN004.sub_name send_type_name ,send_dept.dept_name send_dept_names ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM cmn_message main LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary CMN001 ON CMN001.record_status = 1 AND CMN001.main_cd = 'CMN001' AND CMN001.sub_cd = main.message_type_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary CMN002 ON CMN002.record_status = 1 AND CMN002.main_cd = 'CMN002' AND CMN002.sub_cd = main.importance_degree_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary CMN004 ON CMN004.record_status = 1 AND CMN004.main_cd = 'CMN004' AND CMN004.sub_cd = main.send_type_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dept send_dept ON send_dept.uid = main.send_dept_uids LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
